span.p:
Model Serving Framework
e.g., TorchServe, vLLM, BentoML
Handles requests, batching, etc.

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
API Endpoint Logic
e.g., FastAPI/Flask route

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Inference Code
Adapted from inference.py
Tokenization, Generation

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Your Model
TransformerModel from transformer.py,
Config from params.py

span.p:
Tokenizer
Loaded via Hugging Face,
'gpt2 tokenizer'

span.p:
Autoscaler
e.g., Kubernetes HPA + Karpenter
Adjusts Pod count & Nodes

Monitoring System
e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog

Logs
